en.title: FE's Event Attended by 2000! Pics 02nd August 2008 Event Kuala Lumpur (1).
en.content:
FE's Event on Sat, 02th August 2008 at Hwa Beng Hall, USJ, Selangor was a GREAT SUCCESS attended by 2000 FE Leaders, Members , VIPs and invited guests. It is FE's BIGGEST EVENT EVER!  Thank you everyone for making the event a great success!

VIPs attending include Billi Lim (Best Selling Author and Trainer), International Taekwondo Federation Master, Tom Zuza Vll, Dr Li (FE Spokesman and National Sports Council Physiotherapist), Wong Hong (FE Spokesman and Champion Body Builder), AVS Bathi Allimuthu (FE Spokesman and World Kick Boxing Champion), Jean Daniels ( FE Spokesman and Long Drive Golf Specialist), Dr Amir Farid
(FE Medical Consultant), Dr Siva (FE Medical Consultant), Master Yap (FE Consultant Speaker), Han Jian (Former Badminton World Champion), The Malaysian Men's Bowling Team, Indonesian Bowling Champions (Ryan Lalisang, Putty Insavilla and Sheanny Gunawan) , Patricia Lum (President Malaysian Multicultural Ladies Association), Alan Liew (President KL Dance Association) and Chong Tuck Meng (Founder and Advisor Perwira K9 Association).

Highlights of The Event Include:

- Dance performance by KL Dance Association. Thank you, Alan Liew, Vice President of KL Dance    Association and FE Leader for organizing the performance.

- Opening Speech by KS Lee, FE Marketing Director and Founder.

- Motivation Talk " It's Time to Live Your Dreams" by Speaker Ong Hock Siew.

- Presentation of Quantum Flasks and Quantum Pendants to Malaysian Men's Bowling Team (Adrian Ang,   Aaron Kong,Alex Liew, Daniel Lim, Mohd Nur Aiman ) by Paul Ting, FE CEO and Founder. The Team did   exceptionally well recently at Asian Championships, Hong Kong (Winning Team Gold) and World   Youth Championships, Orlando, USA (Winning Team Gold). Individually, Adrian Ang won the Men's Masters   Gold in the Asian Championships and Aaron Kong won Gold at the World Youth Championships Boys   Masters. FE is proud to have all these WORLD CHAMPIONS gracing our Event!

- Presentation of Quantum Flasks and Quantum Pendants to Indonesian Bowling Champions, Ryan Lalisang,   Putty Insavilla and Sheanny Gunawan.

- Charity Drive by FE together with Multicultural Ladies Assoc Malaysia (MLAM) in support of 4 Y.O.Marcus   Ho who suffers from Thalassaemia Major (Severe Anaemia). Patricia Lum, President of MLAM did a great   job appealing to FE Members to donate to the cause. A total of RM 22,809.00 was raised (FE HQ donated   RM 10,000.00). Thank you all for your generosity!

- Testimonial and Demonstration of QP by Jean Daniels (FE Spokesman and Long Drive Golf Specialist) and   KC Phoon (FE Presidential Director). As usual, the demos were impressive and kept the crowd captivated!   Thank you, Jean and KC!

- Body Building Demo by Wong Hong, Mr Asia and FE Spokesman. Wow!

- Certicate presentation to attendees of School of Networking, Chinese and Bahasa on 25th to 27th July   2008 followed by speeches by Presidential Directors, Dr Mohd Fadil Bin Samion and Tilly Kong.

- Special Recognition Award to Chong Tuck Meng, Founder and Advisor Perwira K9 Assoc, for being first   FE Director in wheelchair. This is truly inspiring!

- Installation of New Directors, Executive Directors and Presidential Directors.
  Congratulations! You made it and MORE SUCCESS to come!

- Biggest gathering of 120 hearing impaired FE Leaders and Members at a single event.
  FE is proud of you all!

- Motivational sharing by Presidential Director, Rachel Thomas.Thank you, Rachel for a powerful speech, as   always! You are an INSPIRATION!

- Closing Speech by Presidential Director, KC Phoon. Thank you, KC for a great speech and for wrapping up    a MOST SUCCESSFUL EVENT!

- Lucky Draws.

meta.description:
FE's Event on Sat 2th August 2008 at Hwa Beng Hall, USJ, Selangor was a GREAT SUCCESS attended by 2000 FE Leaders, Members , VIPs and invited guests. It is FE's BIGGEST EVENT EVER! Thank you everyone for making the event a great success!
VIPs attending include Billi Lim (Best Selling Author and Trainer), International Taekwondo Federation Master, Tom Zuza Vll, Dr Li (FE Spokesman and National Sports Council Physiotherapist), Wong Hong (FE Spokesman and Champion Body Builder), AVS Bathi Allimuthu (FE Spokesman and World Kick Boxing Champion), Jean Daniels ( FE Spokesman and Long Drive Golf Specialist), Dr Amir Farid (FE Medical Consultant), Dr Siva (FE Medical Consultant), Master Yap (FE Consultant Speaker), Han Jian (Former Badminton World Champion), The Malaysian Men's Bowling Team, Indonesian Bowling Champions (Ryan Lalisang, Putty Insavilla and Sheanny Gunawan) , Patricia Lum (President Malaysian Multicultural Ladies Assoc), Alan Liew (President KL Dance Assoc) and Chong Tuck Meng (Founder and Advisor Perwira K9 Assoc.)
Highlights of the Event include:
- Dance perfomance by KL Dance Association. Thank you, Alan Liew, Vice President of KL Dance Association and FE Leader for organising the performance.
- Opening Speech by KS Lee, FE Marketing Director and Founder.
- Motivation Talk " It's Time to Live Your Dreams" by Speaker Ong Hock Siew.
- Presentation of Quantum Flasks and Quantum Pendants to Malaysian Men's Bowling Team ( Adrian Ang, Aaron Kong,Alex Liew, Daniel Lim, Mohd Nur Aiman ) by Paul Ting, FE CEO and Founder. The Team did exceptionally well recently at Asian Championships ,Hong Kong ( winning Team Gold) and World Youth Championships, Orlando, USA ( winning Team Gold ). Individually, Adrian Ang won the Men's Masters Gold in the Asian Championships and Aaron Kong won Gold at the World Youth Championships Boys Masters. FE is proud to have all these WORLD CHAMPIONS gracing our Event!
- Presentation of Quantum Flasks and Quantum Pendants to Indonesian Bowling Champions, Ryan Lalisang, Putty Insavilla and Sheanny Gunawan.
- Charity Drive by FE together with Multicultural Ladies Assoc Malaysia ( MLAM) in support of 4 y.o.Marcus Ho who suffers from Thalassaemia Major ( severe anaemia). Patricia Lum, President of MLAM did a great job appealing to FE Members to donate to the cause. A total of Rm 22,809.00 was raised ( FE HQ donated Rm 10,000.00 ) . Thank you all for your generousity!
- Testimonial and Demonstration of QP by Jean Daniels ( FE Spokesman and Long Drive Golf Specialist) and KC Phoon ( FE Presidential Director). As usual, the demos were impressive and kept the crowd captivated! Thank you, Jean and KC!
- Body Building Demo by Wong Hong, Mr Asia and FE Spokesman. Wow!
- Certicate presentation to attendees of School of Networking, Chinese and Bahasa on 25th to 27th July 2008 followed by speeches by Presidential Directors, Dr Mohd Fadil Bin Samion and Tilly Kong.
- Special Recognition Award to Chong Tuck Meng, Founder and Advisor Perwira K9 Assoc, for being first FE Director in wheelchair. This is truly inspiring!
- Installation of New Directors, Executive Directors and Presidential Directors. Congratulations! You made it and MORE SUCCESS to come!
- Biggest gathering of 120 hearing impaired FE Leaders and Members at a single event. FE is proud of you all!
- Motivational sharing by Presidential Director, Rachel Thomas.Thank you, Rachel for a powerful speech, as always! You are an INSPIRATION!
- Closing Speech by Presidential Director, KC Phoon. Thank you, KC for a great speech and for wrapping up a MOST SUCCESSFUL EVENT!
- Lucky Draws.

VIPs attending include Billi Lim (Best Selling Author and Trainer), International Taekwondo Federation Master, Tom Zuza Vll, Dr Li (FE Spokesman and National Sports Council Physiotherapist), Wong Hong (FE Spokesman and Champion Body Builder), AVS Bathi Allimuthu (FE Spokesman and World Kick Boxing Champion), Jean Daniels ( FE Spokesman and Long Drive Golf Specialist), Dr Amir Farid (FE Medical Consultant), Dr Siva (FE Medical Consultant), Master Yap (FE Consultant Speaker), Han Jian (Former Badminton World Champion), The Malaysian Men's Bowling Team, Indonesian Bowling Champions (Ryan Lalisang, Putty Insavilla and Sheanny Gunawan) , Patricia Lum (President Malaysian Multicultural Ladies Assoc), Alan Liew (President KL Dance Assoc) and Chong Tuck Meng (Founder and Advisor Perwira K9 Assoc.)

The Team did exceptionally well recently at Asian Championships ,Hong Kong ( winning Team Gold) and World Youth Championships, Orlando, USA ( winning Team Gold ). FE is proud to have all these WORLD CHAMPIONS gracing our Event!
- Presentation of Quantum Flasks and Quantum Pendants to Indonesian Bowling Champions, Ryan Lalisang, Putty Insavilla and Sheanny Gunawan.
- Charity Drive by FE together with Multicultural Ladies Assoc Malaysia ( MLAM) in support of 4 y.o.Marcus Ho who suffers from Thalassaemia Major ( severe anaemia). Patricia Lum, President of MLAM did a great job appealing to FE Members to donate to the cause. A total of Rm 22,809.00 was raised ( FE HQ donated Rm 10,000.00 ) . Thank you all for your generousity!
- Testimonial and Demonstration of QP by Jean Daniels ( FE Spokesman and Long Drive Golf Specialist) and KC Phoon ( FE Presidential Director). As usual, the demos were impressive and kept the crowd captivated! Thank you, Jean and KC!
- Body Building Demo by Wong Hong, Mr Asia and FE Spokesman. Wow!
- Certicate presentation to attendees of School of Networking, Chinese and Bahasa on 25th to 27th July 2008 followed by speeches by Presidential Directors, Dr Mohd Fadil Bin Samion and Tilly Kong.
- Special Recognition Award to Chong Tuck Meng, Founder and Advisor Perwira K9 Assoc, for being first FE Director in wheelchair. This is truly inspiring!
- Installation of New Directors, Executive Directors and Presidential Directors. Congratulations! You made it and MORE SUCCESS to come!
- Biggest gathering of 120 hearing impaired FE Leaders and Members at a single event. FE is proud of you all!
- Motivational sharing by Presidential Director, Rachel Thomas.Thank you, Rachel for a powerful speech, as always! You are an INSPIRATION!
- Closing Speech by Presidential Director, KC Phoon. Thank you, KC for a great speech and for wrapping up a MOST SUCCESSFUL EVENT!
- Lucky Draws.
